reason: Customer satisfies 10 out of 11 eligibility rules. The monthly income (₹5,000) is below the required threshold of ₹20,000, which is the primary reason for not being fully approved. All other criteria, including account age, payment history (with one minor underpayment), transaction health, credit utilization, current loans, income-spend health, and credit history strength, are met.
